alert.note: Alert for Cheshire; Eastern Hillsborough; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 19 at 10:02PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Cheshire and Hillsborough Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 1001 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Westmoreland, or 8 miles west of Keene, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Nashua, Merrimack, Keene, Jaffrey, Bedford, Milford, Amherst, Hollis, Peterborough, New Boston, Winchester, Antrim, Mont Vernon, Greenfield, Lyndeborough, Dublin, Francestown, Bennington, Richmond and Harrisville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cheshire; Eastern Hillsborough; Western And Central Hillsborough
